body.name: [New Year Sale] Jethro SC490 4G Unlocked Senior Cell Phone/Plan 6 Months, Unlimited Talk & Text, SIM Card Included, Easy-to-Use for Elders and Kids, Big Screen and Buttons, FCC Certified

deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 14 hrs 37 mins
features: PHONE SERVICE: Stay connected with an unlimited talk & text Jethro Mobile plan for just $8.34/months. Unlimited international calling to 80+ countries at no additional charge. Plan included is good for 6 months. No contracts. Coverage includes Hawaii, Puerto Rico and the US Virgin Islands on the T-Mobile network.
SIMPLE DESIGN: Big buttons for effortless dialing. No side buttons to prevent accidentally pressing power off or volume buttons. See clearly with a 2.8-inch large screen with bright display.
EASY TO USE: Two simplified menu options for easy navigation. One touch speed dialing for quick calling. Photo dialing for quick dialing by picture.
POWERFUL SOUND: Loud and clear volume. Rated M4/T4 for hearing aid compatibility. Equipped with bluetooth connectivity for hearing aids.
EMERGENCY FEATURES: Rear SOS button provides quick access during emergency. Immediately talk and text up to 5 contacts when triggered.

Why get a plan bundle? SIM Pre-Installed JM Plan Included Savings on JM Plan Easy to Set Up For phone & service Jethro Support Type For phone only SIM Pre-Installed JM Plan Included Savings on JM Plan Easy to Set Up For phone & service Jethro Support Type For phone only

What's is included in the box? The box includes 1 SC490, 1 dock, 1 charger, 1 USB cable, 1 battery, 1 user manual, 1 Jethro Mobile SIM card (triple cut). What is Jethro Mobile? Jethro Mobile is an MVNO carrier that offers affordable prepaid plans catered to seniors, kids and anyone who likes to save. What is the Jethro Mobile Simple Plan? The Jethro Mobile Simple plan includes unlimited talk, text, and unlimited international calling to 80+ countries. Why should I get a phone and plan bundle? You should get a phone and plan bundle because its convenient and easy to activate.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars EASY TO USE
reviews.reviewText: This phone is PERFECT for my 91 yr. old dad! I set it up for him then I called his number to see if he was able to answer it. He did great without a problem! I set the ring volume up so he wouldn't have a problem hearing it as well. Great phone for elders!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 18, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very easy to use.
reviews.reviewText: Purchased this for my autistic cousin. Wanted to get rid of her landline, but had trouble teaching her to use a smart phone. Needed something simple with no internet. This fits the bill perfectly. Charges on a stand similar to her old cordless phone so I don’t have to worry about her not plugging it in. Nice big numbers that she can easily see. She is a little hard of hearing, but she has no trouble hearing this phone ring. I love the fact that you can set it to automatically go to speaker phone when she makes or receives a call. Best part is the price of service. $100 for a year of unlimited calls. Landline had gone up to $50 a month, and was out of service about 4 or 5 times a year. If you have an elderly relative, or someone who lacks the finesse or mental capacity to operate a smartphone, you should give this a try. I couldn’t be more pleased with this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We've only had the phone for 2 months and now it doesn't work properly. I can't even get to the settings to try to operate it, and it keeps making a very strange noise. Piece of junk! Too late for a return now.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 21, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Simple to use
reviews.reviewText: Although my caption says simple to use, my mom's dementia is further along than I thought. I can't get her to figure out how to use it. She keeps confusing it with a remote control. To be fair she hasn't used a cell phone in years; just the old fashion push button landline. I set it up and it was easy, I set it up to answer on speaker and the sound quality is good. I would recommend it for seniors. Just not mine. :(

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great option for technology- challenged senior
reviews.reviewText: My mom is almost 91 and has been frustrated by smart phones for the last 5 years. Two years ago we got her the Lively flip phone and it helped for awhile but with a hefty monthly charge for the plan. When that phone died, I did alot of research because she really needed to have an option for when she was away from the house. This is perfect! No data, just unlimited talk and text. We were able to port her number. I set up Photo Dial for the 7 people she calls, and i could set up the emergency button on the back to text me and not call 911 - couldn't be easier and the phone and 1 year of service was $150! She still struggles, believe it or not, but were getting there. Highly recommend if you're in this situation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple and inexpensive
reviews.reviewText: I got this phone for my mom who is in a nursing home, and has some dementia. The local phone company wanted to charge a ridiculous monthly fee just for basic phone service! The Jethro phone offers just what I needed, an easy to use, inexpensive phone so that I can keep in touch with my mom. I was especially looking for a cellphone that is easy to charge. My mom can just keep it in the charging base! The phone came with a SIM card and was very easy to set up. Very happy with my purchase, so far.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 10, 2022
reviews.reviewText: It is adequate and airtime pricing is good. The manual is also basic. It does not say how to connect incoming calls quickly to voicemail which is mostly what I wanted this phone for. Callers have to wait until it rings 6 - 7 times and often that is too long to wait and I get a lot of hang ups. Also, and the worst thing, is that the phone number I was given belonged to someone else and I immediately started getting telemarketing phone calls. This happened with 20 minutes of activating my phone and has continued over time. Telemarketers do not give up. It is frustrating that symbols appear in the corner of the screen that are not listed in the manual and it takes trial and error to resolve this. Currently, I have the symbol for a voicemail message and yet when I try to retrieve the message, I am told there are no messages. I am glad this is just a supplemental phone. It serves some of its purpose but I do not have to rely on it for everything.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great phone for an elder parent!
reviews.reviewText: My Dad was having troubles working his Android phone after his stroke. This phone made it a lot easier for him to use. Another feature that has become invaluable is if my Dad forgets to charge his phone, it sends me a text message that his phone's battery is getting low.
